sources: AWS AI Practitioner Certification Exam Guide
metadata.author: Ben Green

cards.question: What is the AWS AI Practitioner certification code?
How long is the AWS AI Practitioner exam?
What are the main domains covered in the AWS AI Practitioner exam?
cards.answer: AI/ML fundamentals, AWS AI services, responsible AI practices, and AI use cases

cards.question: What is the passing score for the AWS AI Practitioner exam?
What type of questions are on the AWS AI Practitioner exam?
cards.answer: Multiple choice and multiple response questions

cards.question: What is the cost of the AWS AI Practitioner exam?
